name: XWUI Badge Component
description: Badge component for displaying counts, status indicators, or notifications. Supports various variants, sizes, dot mode, and positioning. Can be used standalone or attached to other elements.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

dot.description: Whether to display as a dot (no text)

max.description: Maximum number to display before showing '+' indicator

showZero.description: Whether to show badge when count is zero

position.description: Position when used as overlay on another element

standalone.description: Whether the badge is standalone (not attached to another element)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the badge

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

count.description: Numeric count to display in the badge

text.description: Text to display in the badge (alternative to count)
